verbose_text: Indeed, it has been suggested that JAK2 V617F only confers a weak proliferative advantage on the hematopoietic stem cell (HSC), such that on its own, it would cause an MPN with a very long latency; thus, JAK2 V617F -bearing HSCs may remain harmless for a long time, until genetic or environmental changes such as hematopoietic stress or aging allow clonal dominance and MPN emergence 6.
evidence:
JAK2
 V617F  only confers a weak proliferative advantage on the hematopoietic stem cell (HSC), such that on its own, it would cause an MPN
